A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Terrible plot\, horrible characters\, bad jokes.  This movie had it all!  I hated what they did to Luke.  And\, why couldn't Akbar have sacrificed himself instead of purple-hair-lady?  Would have been a bettrer scene than his 1/2 second death.

I saw this movie on opening weekend and the thing that sticks with me the most is the Rose character.  My\, my what an awful\, throwaway character.  Poorly written and poorly acted.  Makes Jar Jar look like a thespian.  She delivers some of the worst lines of the movie.
 
And\, Luke milks and drinks from sea cow teats.
